cards.title: AI startup Viven raises $35M to create digital twins that fill in for absent team members
cards.tagline: Enhance team collaboration with AI-driven digital twins for absent members
tldr: Bullet 1 (25-35 words): Viven addresses delays in project progress caused by absent team members, allowing for seamless communication and decision-making through AI-powered digital twins.
Bullet 2 (25-35 words): The platform creates personalized digital twins using large language models trained on individual work data, enabling them to respond to colleagues' inquiries accurately.
Bullet 3 (25-35 words): Implement Viven by training digital twins on employee data, ensuring they can assist in real-time collaboration and preserve institutional knowledge for future projects.

Bullet 4 (25-35 words): Use cases include obtaining project updates from team-level twins or accessing knowledge from absent employees, streamlining communication and decision-making processes within PMOs.
